src:
Kebakaran di Cengkareng Hanguskan Kontrakan 36 Pintu
04 Nov 2019, 21:25 by Jabbar Ramdhani
Jakarta - Petugas telah memadamkan kebakaran rumah di Cengkareng, Jakarta Barat. Peristiwa ini menyebabkan kontrakan 36 pintu terbakar.
"Objek (terbakar) kontrakan 2 lantai 36 pintu," kata Kepala Seksi Operasional Suku Dinas Penanggulangan Kebakaran dan Penyelamatan (PKP) Jakarta Barat Rompis Romlih lewat keterangannya, Senin (4/11/2019).
Kontrakan yang terbakar tersebut berlokasi di Jl Waru VI No. 10 RT 14/09 Kedaung Kali Angke, Cengkareng, Jakbar. Pemadaman yang melibatkan 11 unit mobil damkar ini selesai dilakukan pada 18.58 WIB.
Kebakaran ini berdampak pada 34 kepala keluarga yang terdiri dari 68 jiwa. Diperkirakan luas area yang terbakar mencapai 600 meter persegi dengan kerugian sekitar Rp 600 juta.
"Dugaan penyebab sementara korsleting listrik pada sambungan kabel di atas plafon," kata dia.
Tak ada korban akibat peristiwa ini.

(jbr/fdu)
text:
The fire in Cengkareng scorched a rented 36-door
04 Nov 2019, 21:25 by Jabbar Ramdhani
Jakarta - Officers have extinguished a house fire in Cengkareng, West Jakarta. This incident caused the rent of 36 doors to catch fire.
"The object (burning) of the rented 2 floors is 36 doors," said Head of West Jakarta Fire and Rescue Service Sub-dept. Rompis Romlih through his statement on Monday (4/11/2019).
The burned contract is located at Jl Waru VI No. 10 RT 14/09 Kedaung Kali Angke, Cengkareng, West Jakarta. The blackout involving 11 fire truck units was completed at 18.58 West Indonesia Time.
This fire affected 34 families consisting of 68 people. It is estimated that the area burned has reached 600 square meters with a loss of around Rp. 600 million.
"The suspected cause is a temporary electrical short circuit in the cable connection above the ceiling," he said.
There were no casualties due to this incident.

(jbr / fdu)
